frontend/src/components/ImageLightbox.ts: Empty placeholder file for an image lightbox component.

frontend/src/components/MobileMenu.tsx: Mobile slide‑in navigation menu showing links and categories, handling body scroll lock and escape-to-close.
frontend/src/components/pages/AdminUsers: Admin panel for listing, filtering, adding, promoting, and demoting user roles with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/pages/Categories: Admin interface for listing, searching, creating, editing, deleting, and reordering categories.

frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product card with image loading fallback, barcode, stock badge, and navigation to product detail.

frontend/src/components/ProductDetailVie: Displays detailed product information, handles image loading, barcode copying, sharing, and WhatsApp contact, with optional back/close controls.
frontend/src/components/ProductModal.tsx: Provides a form modal for creating or editing products, including image upload/compression, field initialization, validation, and save handling.
frontend/src/components/PublicHeader.tsx: Renders the public site header with logo, navigation links, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/PublicLayout.tsx: Defines the public page layout with header, footer, routed content, and conditional cookie consent.
frontend/src/components/SafeSelect.tsx: Implements a select component that enforces sentinel values and prevents empty-string errors, with helper utilities.
frontend/src/components/SearchBar.tsx: Implements a debounced product search with autocomplete, full results toggle, and product detail modal integration.
frontend/src/components/SidebarNavigatio: Renders the admin sidebar navigation with route highlighting and mobile overlay handling.
frontend/src/components/StoreBanner.tsx: Displays a full-width banner with store branding, promotional text, and a dynamic WhatsApp contact link.
frontend/src/components/Toast.tsx: Toast component handling timed display, pause/resume on hover, and type-specific styling/icons.
frontend/src/components/ToastContainer.t: Renders active toasts from the store inside a container.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes. Initializes access control using a secret token if available.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity authentication, managing login, logout, identity persistence, and status tracking. Wraps AuthClient setup and exposes identity state to consumers.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductDetail.ts: Hook that fetches a single product, categories, and store details, returning loading states and derived category name. Simplifies access to product detail data for UI components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralized React Query hooks for backend operations including products, categories, store details, user profiles, roles, and admin checks. Handles stable actor usage, caching, and mutation side effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useToast.ts: Simple helper hook exposing success, error, warning, and info toast functions backed by the toastStore.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers, defines light/dark theme CSS variables, and includes toast notification component styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRoute.tsx: Protects admin-only routes by checking authentication and admin status, showing loading, login, or access-denied states.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Displays a category’s products with infinite scrolling, manages pagination state, and cleans up related queries on unmount.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Fetches and displays store contact info with loading and error handling, including phone, WhatsApp, email, and map links.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Loads featured categories with products, handles initial loading and errors, and supports product detail modals.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Shows the privacy policy, using store details when available and scrolling to the top on mount.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Product detail page component that loads product data, manages loading/error states, updates title, and renders the product view with cleanup of related queries.
frontend/src/stores/toastStore.ts: Zustand store managing toast notifications with add, remove, pause, and resume functions plus helper creators.
frontend/src/utils/ApiResponseHandler.ts: Utility for standardized API response handling with BigInt parsing, error classification, and error object creation.
frontend/src/utils/BigIntSerializer.ts: BigInt-safe JSON parsing and stringifying utilities, including validation and conversion helpers.
frontend/src/utils/NumericConverter.ts: Utilities for safe numeric conversion and validation, including VAT and profit margin checks.
frontend/src/utils/phoneFormatter.ts: Phone formatting helpers for WhatsApp API and Spanish display, normalizing and formatting numbers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the hash.
frontend/src/workers/session-worker.js: A web worker that periodically posts keep‑alive messages to maintain an active admin session.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the app’s purpose, architecture, and existing feature set.
